The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some loving it while others find it feels cheap. The length and cut also get mixed reviews - while some find the length nice, others say it's too short, and while some like the deep V cut, others note it's not a straight cut. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful dress! Very comfortable!
items.body: Wore this to a wedding and was so comfortable! Danced all night. Fit great! Simple dress but very elegant. I ordered navy. Great length for petite with a pair of heels. Loved it! Read more
items.author: momoftwogirls

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: True to fit and simply gorgeous. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Barbara

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good In A Pinch!
items.body: I ordered this last minute to wear to my boyfriend’s families wedding which was an outdoor wedding. It was extremely hot and humid, the dress was super lightweight which was really nice. The material is almost swimsuit like, so sweat stains will show. If you’re a bigger girl like me and you don’t like your belly lines showing, you may not want this dress. It can cling to you slightly, just enough that you could see the outline of stomach. It wasn’t too noticeable though. I ordered an XXL (I wear XL/XXL typically) to air on the side of caution, and I’d say it fit pretty well. Length might be short on slightly taller folks, I’m about 5’6 and it hit perfectly at my ankles. Color was as expected. Overall given the fact that it was a last minute purchase, I would recommend. Read more
items.author: Kristin

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars BUYER BEWARE: Does not look like the picture shown
items.body: Amazon messed up the last item I ordered and this was my last ditch effort to get something fitting the attire for an event I am attending tomorrow. The item arrives quickly, I will say that the material feels nice although a bit thin and transparent it can still work. I ordered this dress for the slit length on the side this is one of the inaccuracies with the actual dress and the picture. The actual dress the slit is much lower and it appears to have a place to extend the slit if you cut the seem however this only seems to extend it roughly 2" (which still does not bring it close to what the picture shows) and there is a horizontal stitch that keeps the seem from continuously rising. So I am unsure of how to get past this without destroying the esthetic of the dress and if I do, what keeps it from extending on its own throughout my event. I am not a seamstress, which is why I ordered what I wanted from Amazon as opposed to making it myself. The other portion is a similar issue at the top where most pictures/reviews show you need to cut the seem to obtain the look reflected in the picture. What I don't understand is why this isn't already done. If you don't want it cut then your option is to safety pin it? Sounds a bit tacky and unnecessary since a dress was purchased based off the way the picture looked. *personally I needed something very quick due to the previous delivery of the wrong next day item I didn't have time to look at anything beyond pictures and overall ratings in order to have it here same day... I URGE YOU TO TAKE THE TIME! Last, a lot of reviews are naming receiving used items. My dress had one of the sleeves inside out as if someone didn't put it right side in after trying it on. I think a lot of people are disappointed with this purchase and return just as quickly as they receive it. Fortunately the condition of mine wasn't ad bad as others. I am out of time and having a hard time deciding on returning or just moving forward with this and attempting the altering myself (no time for finding anyone to make alterations) really bummed that the money I paid for the item I thought I was receiving was a waste. Buyer beware! Read more
items.author: Ceidot Jaie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not for me
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress is very cute and definitely very comfortable. Fabric is soft and stretchy and flowy. That said, I don’t think the dress is for me. It doesnt do anything for me/my body. It has a scrunch in the back that helps tighten around the waist. I don’t have much of a “shape” so this dress doesn’t do much for my body. It is pretty full coverage and modest. Just not what I was going for. I feel like I look like a pilgrim, a stylish one at least. If this was the look i was going for, the dress would be perfect. Great length, very comfortable, stretchy, and cute. Fabric is thin though. Doesn’t feel cheap but not luxurious either. It wasn’t see through on me but it it was tighter it might be a little see through. The slit didn’t feel like it was high enough, it was an awkward placement for me. A small fit me perfectly. I’m 130 lbs, 5’4, and 34DD. Read more
items.author: Familia Llanos

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy & flattering
items.body: This dress is COMFY. I tried it in a large and xl, but ended up keeping the large. I think it’s very true to size, but has a little leeway because of the stretch material. It is the right thickness to not be see through but also not feel heavy. I love the flow of it and especially love the color. I think it’s a flattering dress and good quality. I’d buy it again in other colors too. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, and an affordable price!
items.body: Oh my goodness, girls! I have been looking for a dress for 6 months or so to my nieces wedding. I am 5'5 and weigh about 145 lb. I bought a large and this dress came in and saved my life. I put it on and it fit me like a glove, has a cute slit, covers my shoulders, I'm not going to snip the deep v that it could have because I'm not that comfortable with my breasts but here's some pictures. I don't have my shoes on that I'm going to wear but it's also the perfect length. I have to wear flats because of arthritis and it's not even skimming the floor... At 5'5 it's a perfect length for me. I highly recommend this dress if you have a fancy event to go to. Read more
items.author: Mysti A. Hearold

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Blue dress
items.body: I am thankful it came in a timely matter. However, I really didn’t like that my dress was just in a clear ziplock. I feel like my privacy was compromised even though it’s just a dress, what if I had ordered something else? Please go back to the regular Amazon bags!! The fit is good though I was hoping it would have been a little longer. The print quality… I thought it would be of a thicker fabric. This material is quite thin and almost reminds me of a dress from a cheap brand. I am a little disappointed with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Daddy Sith

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Formal Short Sleeve Cocktail V Neck Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Formal Short Sleeve Cocktail V Neck Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Z-long Sleeve Light Blue, Short Sleeve Pink, Short Sleeve Green, Z-long Sleeve Fushascia Pink, Short Sleeve Black, Short Sleeve Navy Blue, Short Sleeve Army Green, Z-long Sleeve Navy Blue, Short Sleeve Wine Red, Z-long Sleeve Brown, Z-long Sleeve Sky Blue, Z-long Sleeve Army Green, Z-long Sleeve Blue Green, Short Sleeve Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
